modalBox.title: Solar Energy
modalBox.content: Solar energy is a renewable power source harnessed from the sun. It's eco-friendly, reduces electricity bills, and requires minimal maintenance.

modalBox.title: Wind Power
modalBox.content: Wind power is a sustainable energy solution that reduces greenhouse gas emissions. It provides clean electricity while preserving natural resources.

modalBox.title: Water Conservation
modalBox.content: Conserving water is vital to protect our planet. Simple actions like fixing leaks and using water-efficient appliances make a big difference.

modalBox.title: Recycling
modalBox.content: Recycling reduces waste, saves energy, and helps protect the environment. Make it a habit to recycle paper, plastic, glass, and metal.

modalBox.title: Reducing Carbon Footprint
modalBox.content: Reducing your carbon footprint can be achieved by using energy-efficient appliances, driving less, and adopting plant-based diets.
